message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $12,000 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  Let's see if we can find common ground there.
Alice, I understand your position, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,500.  If we can't agree on that, I'll have to explore other options.
